channel.title: MY PROJECTILES... Help. ~ READ WHOLE POST ~
channel.description:
Okay.. I have my projectiles working for (DBOW).. But when i am standing close to a player... it hits like a normal bow... With 1 arrow.. Not 2...
When i am a few squares away... It will shoot the 2 arrows at the player... But it wont shoot them again.. Then it carries on as 1 normal arrow... Then, when im a bit further away.. The bow does the right animation, but it doesn't shoot any arrows at all, nor hits the player... MY PROJECTILES : createProjectile(absY, absX, offsetX, offsetY, 50, 100, 249, 43, 31, 0 - AttackingOn); createProjectile(absY, absX, offsetX, offsetY, 50, 80, 249, 43, 31, 0 - AttackingOn);
If that helps.. :S... Does anyone know how to fix it so, it hits 2 projectiles EVERY HIT...? Not just on the first hit... And also, make it hit from quite a distance...?
would be apreciated..!

item.title: MY PROJECTILES... Help. ~ READ WHOLE POST ~
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Do you think maybe there is something i can add like a loop for the projectile…? Cause the projectile only attacks once… Then stops, and when the enemy moves closer, like 1 sq away… It attacks normal with 1 arrow - NO GFX -… :S… Could someone maybe help me/point in right direction of what i must do?

Read full topic

item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

That post is against the rules. Don't spam. Just make the heights further apart, like 60, for the first one, and 35 for the second.
Okay, i have the projectiles good... Few other problems... When im attacking a player from a distance... The projectile, (DOUBLE) works.. But once its done the projectile.. It stops attacking completely.. Until the Enemy moves closer... Then it only attacks like normal, 1 arrow... Also, when standing next to your Enemy, it doesn't do the correct projectile.. Well it might do, but i only see 1 arrow... EDIT: Any ideas how i can fix this?

item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

In this…

createProjectile(absY, absX, offsetX, offsetY, 50, 100, 249, 43, 31, 0 - AttackingOn);

Is the 43 the start height… If so… I changed the second create projectile… to… 40… And it only does 1 arrow…
And guys… This doesn’t really answer my questions… I need it constant hitting double projectile… Now, it hits double projectile… And then carries on with 1 arrow like a normal bow… Also when im standing from a distance and i attack a player… It does the right animation… But it doesn’t hit nor show the projectile… How am i meant to fix these both…
Would apreciate
